projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Carousell Android App Improvements
projects.description: Improved Android app performance and stability via architectural changes and code optimizations. Reduced ANR rates by 15%.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

projects.title: Horizon Client Android App Improvements
projects.description: Worked on the Horizon Client Android App. Fixed a lot of crashes, improved the architecture of the app.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Explain your experience with Django and DRF, including specific projects and the challenges you faced.
Describe your experience optimizing database queries in PostgreSQL. Can you provide an example?
How have you implemented authentication and authorization in your previous projects?
Explain your experience with writing unit and integration tests.
How familiar are you with RESTful API principles? Describe a scenario where you applied these principles.
Given a list of unsorted integers, how would you find the median?
Explain your experience with Celery and message queues.
Describe your experience with CI/CD pipelines. What tools have you used?
Have you used any AWS services like S3 or Lambda? If so, describe your experience.
